plot: Father Louis Page, a catholic priest, has lost his mother. Facing doubts in his faith, he decided to make a pilgrimage to Compostelle. On his way he's involved in many stories, trying to help people and to lighten his own burden.
plot_en: Father Louis Page, a catholic priest, has lost his mother. Facing doubts in his faith, he decided to make a pilgrimage to Compostelle. On his way he's involved in many stories, trying to help people and to lighten his own burden.
plot_es: Father Louis Page, a catholic priest, has lost his mother. Facing doubts in his faith, he decided to make a pilgrimage to Compostelle. On his way he's involved in many stories, trying to help people and to lighten his own burden.
title: Louis Page
